TopicTitle: KSP keeps crashing when return to Space Center

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have about 15 crash logs from the last 4 days alone. I hope anybody can tell me what is crashing my game.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/pvkb22ql51kz5x1/Kerbal Space Program Crashlogs.zip?dl=0

 

Sven
You're using the 32bit executable, use 64bit one instead.

Steam starts 32bit by default -.- googled how to change the launch options, hope it works now, thx.

Edit: Many hours later, it still works. KSP is taking 4.4 GB of ram now, so it apparently ran out of memory. For those using Steam, the command is:

"E:\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP_x64.exe" %command%

Of course, you have to enter the correct system path on your system.

Edited November 12, 2017 by Verband
